Screenwriter: Judd Apatow, Pete Davidson, Dave Sirus
Production Co: Apatow Productions, Universal Pictures, Perfect World Pictures
Rating: R (Language|Drug Use Throughout|Sexual Content|Some Violence/Bloody Images)
Synopsis: An aimless slacker dreams of becoming a tattoo artist while living with his mother and hanging out with his friends in Staten Island, N.Y.
Title: The King of Staten Island
